name: Super Shipwreckers 5
description:
Super ShipWreckers 5 is a video game created for a class project during my sophomore year. The style of the game is 2D pixel. The premiss of the game is a two person fighting game where you have the ability to throw and change weapons during the match. 

Made By:

Christian Hotte - Programmer, Artist

Jake Stone - Artist, Animator

John Puleio - Sound, animation Compiler
